item.title: A little bit about us
item.author: edibleclinic@gmail.com (The Edible Clinic)
item.description: We analyze the ingredients list of skincare using resources such as the Environmental Working Group (EWG), a non-profit organization dedicated to research and education about environmental and health concerns. EWG uses a scoring system from 1-10 to rate the known and suspected hazards of ingredients based on published literature.

item.title: Photo Sharing Policy
item.author: edibleclinic@gmail.com (The Edible Clinic)
item.description: We love and appreciate when people share our content! However, please include a link back to the corresponding page on our site, listing full credit to The Edible Clinic. Use of our photos without our permission and without proper attribution is prohibited. We do not allow our images to be directly monetized through affiliate marketing,whether on a website or social media platforms. Please contact us via email to seek permission for the use of any images outside of the guidelines listed above.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.author: edibleclinic@gmail.com (The Edible Clinic)
item.description: Effective date: 06/01/2020 Introduction Welcome to The Edible Clinic. The Edible Clinic ("us", "we", or "our") operates edibleclinic.github.io (hereinafter referred to as " Service"). Our Privacy Policy governs your visit to edibleclinic.github.io, and explains how we collect, safeguard and disclose information that results from your use of our Service. We use your data to provide and improve Service. By using Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
